br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.hypermedia

Class DefaultConfigurableHypermediaResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.hypermedia.DefaultConfigurableHypermediaResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableHypermediaResource, HypermediaResource, RelationBuilder

    public class DefaultConfigurableHypermediaResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurableHypermediaResource
    Default implementation. Uses a RelationBuilder to record relations and add it later when configuring relation.
    Since:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    Lucas Cavalcanti
